nodes.title: Anthony Hopkins
nodes.subtitle: Wikipedia
nodes.body: Sir Philip Anthony Hopkins CBE is a Welsh actor, director, and producer. One of Britain's most recognisable and prolific actors, he is known for his performances on the screen and stage

nodes.title: Why Anthony Hopkins Found His Role As The MCU's Odin 'Pointless'
nodes.subtitle: Slash Film
nodes.body: The Oscar winner cut his teeth doing Shakespeare plays in the '60s. No wonder he didn't need to act to play Odin in a superhero movie.

nodes.title: Anthony Hopkins to Play Roman Emperor in Roland Emmerich's Gladiator Drama "Those About to Die"
nodes.subtitle: Variety
nodes.body: Hopkins is the first major cast member announced for the project. He will play Vespasian, a Roman emperor and rural upstart who claimed his throne after victory in a bloody ten-year civil war.

nodes.title: King takes part in first Trooping the Colour ceremony as monarch
nodes.subtitle: The Independent
nodes.body: This is the first time Charles has taken part in the annual ceremony on Horse Guards Parade in Whitehall as the head of state.
